name: Chemex
recipe: 660g Water / 44g Coffee / Chemex / Chemex Filters / Gooseneck Kettle / Scale / Timer

instructions.2: Place filter in Chemex, and rinse with hot water
instructions.3: Course grind coffee and add to Chemex
instructions.4: Add 75g of water and let bloom for 45 seconds.
instructions.5: Continue adding water in heavy 75g pours until you reached your total water amount
instructions.6: Total brew time should be between 3:30 - 4:30 minutes

quote: The Chemex is as aesthetically pleasing as it is able to make delicious, well-rounded coffee for you and your friend(s), -Tim

name: Clever Dripper
recipe: 425g Water / 28g Coffee / Clever /  Filters / Decanter / Scale / Timer

instructions.2: Place filter in Clever, and rinse with hot water
instructions.3: Medium grind coffee and add to Clever
instructions.4: Add 60g of water and let bloom for 30 seconds.
instructions.5: Continue adding water until you reached your total of 425g and cover Clever with lid
instructions.6: Place Clever on top of a decanter or large mug at 3:00 minutes to drain

quote: If you want to brew smart instead of hard, it would be wise of you to brew with the Clever. -Tim

name: Aeropress
recipe: 230g Water / 16g Coffee / Aeropress / Aeropress Filters / Timer

instructions.2: Place filter in basket, and rinse with hot water, and attach basket to chamber
instructions.4: Add grounds & 20g of water to bloom for 30 seconds
instructions.5: Add remaining water to brew for 1 minute 30 seconds
instructions.6: Set plunger on chamber and press for 30 seconds

quote: The aeropress is weird, but it's the best way to make coffee for you and your friend(s), -Tim

name: French Press

instructions.2: Coarsely grind coffee and add to French Press
instructions.3: Add water and start 4 minute timer

quote: The French Press makes coffee with lots of body and sweetness. Profiter avec les autres! -Tim

name: Kalita Wave
recipe: 385g Water / 26g Coffee / Kalita / Filters / Gooseneck Kettle / Scale / Timer

instructions.2: Place filter in Kalita, and rinse with hot water
instructions.3: Medium grind coffee and add to Kalita
instructions.4: Add 50g of water and let bloom for 30 seconds.
instructions.5: Continue adding water in heavy 50g pours until you reached your total water amount
instructions.6: Total brew time should be between 3 - 4 minutes

quote: Don't quote me on this, but the Kalita Wave is 100% foolproof. You'll always get lots of clarity and sweetness -Tim

name: Hario V60
recipe: 400g Water / 28g Coffee / V60 / Filters / Gooseneck Kettle / Scale / Timer

instructions.2: Place filter in V60, and rinse with hot water
instructions.3: Medium grind coffee and add to V60
instructions.4: Add 50g of water and let bloom for 30 seconds.
instructions.5: Continue adding water in heavy 50g pours until you reached your total water amount
instructions.6: Total brew time should be between 2:30 - 3:30 minutes

quote: The V60 makes wonderfully bright cups & offers lots of variety base on your technique -Tim

name: Coffee Brewer
recipe: 6 Cups of Water / 6.5 Tablespoons of Coffee / Coffee Brewer / Coffee Filter

instructions.1: Eyeball 6 cups of water in your coffee pot and add to brewer
instructions.2: Place coffee filter in brew basket
instructions.3: Scoop 6.5 tbsp of coffee into brew basket

quote: Lots of coffee fanatics believe that single cup brewing is the best way to make delicious coffee. I don't think it's about the size of the brewer, though, it's how you use it. -Tim
